home.title: We provide the tools to build online educational simulations
home.sub-title: Educational Simulated Interaction Models (eduSIMs) are designed and clinically tested simulations that can be used by teachers and facilitators to improve engagement and learning in their classrooms or workshops.
home.welcomeText: Choose from a selection of existing simulations to use with your students / participants or create your own.
home.student_welcome: Join an existing simulation. A room code is required from your teacher / facilitator.
home.getCodeOrCreateSim: If not, get one from your teacher/facilitator, or <1>create your own simulation.</1>
home.cookieOverview: eduSIM uses cookies to run simulations, not to collect user data. By continuing to browse the site you are agreeing to our use of cookies.
home.cookieDetails: We use cookies to track simulation settings such as name and role type, as well as other settings such as language options. Third party cookies are also used for logging in with Google / Microsoft.
home.aboutP1: eduSIM is a web based application for creating and hosting online educational simulators. The core feature of eduSIM is that it facilitates synchronized teamwork over the web, allowing groups of participants to work together remotely in realtime.
home.aboutP2: eduSIM offers many features for creating complex simulations, known as Educational Simulated Interaction Models (eduSIMs), via its Edit Mode. Once created, these simulations can be administered to groups of participants via its Admin Mode.
home.aboutP3: The eduSIM platform is licensed under an <1>Ontario Commons License - No Derivatives.</1> Example simulations provided with the eduSIM platform are licensed under a <3>Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.</3>
home.aboutP4: eduSIM was designed and developed by the <1>Dumond Design Lab</1> at the University of Ottawa.
home.aboutP5: This project is made possible with funding by the Government of Ontario and through eCampusOntario’s support of the Virtual Learning Strategy. To learn more about the Virtual Learning Strategy visit: <1>https://vls.ecampusontario.ca.</1>

admin.deleteSimConfirmExplanation: Are you sure you want to delete the {{name}} simulation? This action cannot be undone.
admin.revokeSimConfirmExplanation: Are you sure you want your access to the {{name}} simulation revoked? This action cannot be undone.
admin.goBackSim: Backtrack this simulation by one page
admin.goBackAllSims: Backtrack all simulations by one page
admin.advanceSim: Advance this simulation by one page
admin.advanceAllSims: Advance all simulations by one page
admin.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset every simulation room? (A backup log will be saved.)
admin.confirmDeleteLog: Are you sure you want to delete this game log?

sidebar.notConnectedToChat: You aren't connected to any chat room!
sidebar.highContrastModeExplanation: Applies a filter for higher contrasting colours.
sidebar.modifyTextSizeExplanation: Adjust how large text appears in-app.

edit.overviewExplanation: Edit Mode allows you to create and edit simulations. Simulations have two main components: the group area (with the grid background), and the personal area (located at the bottom of the screen). To toggle opening/closing the personal area use the red arrow button at the top right of the personal area. The group area will be shared by all the users in a simulation while the personal area contents are determined by the user's role and are only visible to the user. To create/edit roles use the role picker located in the top left of the personal area.
edit.confirmDeletePage: Are you sure you want to delete page {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
edit.pageColorChangeWarning: Warning: Changing page colors may affect website accessibility. Ensure you are using a high enough contrast for text to be easily readable. Click confirm if you wish to activate this feature.
edit.clickCogToEditChoices: Click the cog to edit choices...
edit.confirmDeleteOverlay: Are you sure you want to delete overlay {{name}} and all associated data? This action cannot be undone.
edit.question: Question
edit.correctAnswerBlankAccepted: Correct Answer (Leave blank if not applicable):
edit.correctAnswerSeparateByComma: To put multiple valid answers separate them by a comma.
edit.label: Label
edit.confirmDeleteRole: Are you sure you want to delete the {{name}} role? This action cannot be undone.
edit.noInteractiveObjects: There are currently no interactive objects.
edit.interactiveObjectsExplanation: If you add interactive objects to the group area or personal area, settings for their performance report will show up here.
edit.performanceReportExplanation: The performance report is used to show players feedback about what they have done during the simulation.
edit.noDataToDisplay: There is currently no data to display.
edit.noDataExplanation: Interact with parts of the simulation to see your progress here.
edit.noDataExplanationAdmin: Data will appear here once students have started to interact with the simulation.

modal.inviteCollaboratorsExplanation: To add a collaborator, enter their email address. They will be sent a personal invitation link to create an account and join the simulation.
